title: Vindiciæ medicinæ & medicorum: or An apology for the profession and professors of physick In answer to the several pleas of illegal practitioners; wherein their positions are examined, their cheats discovered, and their danger to the nation asserted. As also an account of the present pest, in answer to a letter. By Nath. Hodges, M.D. Coll. Lond.
author: Hodges, Nathaniel, 1629-1688.
publisher: printed by J.F. for Henry Brome,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
